column5: Hi Everyone,  My buddies and I are looking for a good lake that has good Pickerel and Pike fishing in Aug/Sept that is approx. 4-5 hrs away from T.O. We want to get away from the crowds and heavy fishing pressure.  Can you please suggest some places?  Thanks!
Does anyone else have any suggestions?  I would greatly appreciate any help.  Thank you in advance.
try polar bear outfitters flyin and drive to lakes
Lake Lauzon aviation, if you're interested in doing a fly-in.
You'll find some good fishing on Manitoulin Island.
You can make Temagami in 5 hours...but if the drive is a bit long, head for the French...Pickerel River...Key river...Magnetawan...
Thanks guys!  I really appreciate it.
